casebody.data:
BOYD
v.
ROBESON COUNTY, et al. No. 221P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Scott C. Hart, New Bern, for Robeson County, et al. Rebecca J. Britton, Fayetteville, for Daphne Boyd. Scott D. MacLatchie, Charlotte, for NC Asso. of County Commissioners.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of May 2005 by Amicus for Leave to File Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as Moot by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2005."
